OrgName: Bruns Consulting, LLC (aka The Survey Institute)
activities: We conduct employee and customer survey research for the purpose of understanding the perception of such audiences with their employer or the producer of a product.  We only receive information that will help us assign surveys such as a name, work group, email address.  We have never received anyone' personal address, phone number, fax numer of social security number or anything that might be used to track down wher someone lives.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom
